But adding an overlay never affects how the original suite is executed. That is, mtr always executes the original suite as if no overlay was present. And then, additionally, it executes a combined "union" of the overlay and the original suite. When doing that, mtr takes care to avoid re-executing tests that are not changed in the overlay. For example, creating t/create.opt in the overlay of the main suite will only cause create.test to be executed in the overlay. But creating suite.opt affects all tests — and it will cause all tests to be re-executed with the new options.
trans-unit.target: 但是，添加覆盖绝不会影响原始套件的执行方式。也就是说，mtr总是执行原始套件，就像没有覆盖层一样。然后，另外，它执行覆盖图和原始套件的组合“联合”。这样做时，mtr会避免重新执行覆盖中未更改的测试。例如，在主套件的覆盖区中创建 t/create.opt create.test 只会导致create.test在覆盖区中执行。但是创建 suite.opt 会影响所有测试-它将导致使用新选项重新执行所有测试。

trans-unit.source: By convention, server variables have usually been specified with an underscore in the configuration files, and a dash on the command line. You can however specify underscores as dashes - they are interchangeable.
trans-unit.target: 按照约定，通常在配置文件中用下划线指定服务器变量，并在命令行上使用破折号。但是，您可以将下划线指定为破折号-它们可以互换。

trans-unit.source: By convention, server variables have usually been specified with an underscore in the configuration files, and a dash on the command line. You can however specify underscores as dashes - they are interchangeable.
trans-unit.target: 按照惯例,服务器变量通常在配置文件中用下划线来指定,而在命令行中用破折号来指定。然而,你也可以将下划线指定为破折号,它们是可以互换的。

trans-unit.source: By default S3 tables are ignored. With this option set, the result file will contain a CREATE statement for a similar Aria table, followed by the table data and ending with an ALTER TABLE xxx ENGINE=S3. From MariaDB 10.5.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将忽略S3表。设置此选项后，结果文件将包含一个用于类似Aria表的CREATE语句，然后是表数据，并以 ALTER TABLE xxx ENGINE=S3 结尾。从MariaDB 10.5.0开始。

trans-unit.source: By default join_cache_level is set to 2. In other words only usage of flat or incremental BNL is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，join_cache_level设置为2。换句话说，仅允许使用平面或增量BNL。

trans-unit.source: By default MariaDB 10.1 and earlier releases come compiled with XtraDB as the default InnoDB replacement. From MariaDB 10.2, InnoDB is the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，MariaDB 10.1和更早版本随XtraDB一起编译，作为默认的InnoDB替代品。从MariaDB 10.2开始，InnoDB是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: By default ColumnStore will write create an extent file of 256*1024*WIDTH bytes for the first partition, if this is too small then for uncompressed data it will create a file of the maximum size for the extent (MAX_BLOCKS * BLOCK_SIZE). Snappy always compression adds a header block.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,ColumnStore会为第一个分区写创建一个256*1024*WIDTH字节的范围文件,如果这个文件太小,那么对于未压缩的数据,它将创建一个范围最大大小的文件(MAX_BLOCKS*BLOCK_SIZE)。Snappy总是压缩后增加一个头块。

trans-unit.source: By default MariaDB uses the following permissions for files and directories:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,MariaDB对文件和目录使用以下权限。

trans-unit.source: By default all plugins are enabled and built as dynamic .so (or .dll) modules. If a plugin does not support dynamic builds, it is not built at all.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有插件均已启用并构建为动态 .so （或 .dll ）模块。如果插件不支持动态构建，则根本不会构建。

trans-unit.source: By default block-based algorithms can be used only for regular (inner) join operations. To allow them for outer join operations (left outer joins and right outer joins) the optimizer switch outer_join_with_cache has to be set to 'on'. Setting the optimizer switch semijoin_with_cache to 'on' allows using these algorithms for semi-join operations.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，基于块的算法只能用于常规（内部）联接操作。为了允许它们进行外部联接操作（左外部联接和右外部联接），必须将优化器开关 outer_join_with_cache 设置为“ on”。将优化器开关 semijoin_with_cache 设置为“ on”可以将这些算法用于半联接操作。

trans-unit.source: By default events from all users are logged, but certain users can be excluded from logging by using the server_audit_excl_users variable. For example, to exclude users valerianus and rocky from having their events logged:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将记录所有用户的事件，但是可以使用server_audit_excl_users变量将某些用户排除在日志之外。例如，要排除用户缬草和落基山脉的用户记录其事件：

trans-unit.source: By default it corrects the checksum and if necessary adds the mariadb-version field. If the optional FROM MYSQL clause is used, and no mariadb-version field is present, the MERGE and TEMPTABLE algorithms are toggled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它会纠正校验和，并在必要时添加mariadb-version字段。如果使用了可选的 FROM MYSQL 子句，并且不存在mariadb-version字段，则将切换MERGE和TEMPTABLE算法。

trans-unit.source: By default mcsimport rolls back the entire bulk import if a malformed csv entry is found. With this option mcsimport ignores detected malformed csv entries and continiues with the injection.
trans-unit.target: 在默认情况下,如果发现一个错误的csv条目,mcsimport会回滚整个批量导入。有了这个选项,mcsimport会忽略检测到的错误的csv条目并继续注入。

trans-unit.source: By default mcsimport treats input strings with the value "NULL" as data. If the null_option is set to 1 strings with the value "NULL" are treated as NULL values.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，mcsimport将值“ NULL”的输入字符串视为数据。如果将null_option设置为1，则将值为“ NULL”的字符串视为NULL值。

trans-unit.source: By default mcsimport uses YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS as input date format. An individual global date format can be specified via the command line parameter -df using the strptime format. Column specific input date formats can be defined in the mapping file and overwrite the global date format.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，mcsimport使用YYYY-MM-DD HH：MM：SS作为输入日期格式。可以通过命令行参数-df使用strptime格式指定单个全局日期格式。可以在映射文件中定义列特定的输入日期格式，并覆盖全局日期格式。

trans-unit.source: By default mcsimport uses YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS as input date format. An individual global date format can be specified via the command line parameter -df using the strptime format. Column specific input date formats can be defined in the mapping file and overwrite the global date format.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，mcsimport使用YYYY-MM-DD HH：MM：SS作为输入日期格式。可以通过命令行参数-df使用strptime格式指定单个全局日期格式。可以在映射文件中定义列特定的输入日期格式，并覆盖全局日期格式。

trans-unit.source: By default mcsimport uses a read cache size of 20,971,520 (20 MiB) to cache chunks of the input file in RAM. It can be changed through the command line paramter -rc. A minimum cache size of 1,048,576 (1 MiB) is required.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,mcsimport使用20,971,520(20 MiB)的读取缓存大小来缓存RAM中的输入文件块。它可以通过命令行参数-rc来改变。需要最小的缓存大小为1,048,576(1 MiB)。

trans-unit.source: By default mcsimport uses the double-quote character " as enclosing character. It can be changed through the command line parameter -E. The enclosing character's length is limited to 1.
trans-unit.target: 缺省情况下，mcsimport使用双引号字符“作为封闭字符。可以通过命令行参数-E对其进行更改。封闭字符的长度限制为1。

trans-unit.source: By default mcsimport uses the double-quote character " as escaping character. It can be changed through the command line parameter -C. The escaping character's length is limited to 1.
trans-unit.target: 缺省情况下，mcsimport使用双引号字符“作为转义字符。可以通过命令行参数-C对其进行更改。转义字符的长度限制为1。

trans-unit.source: By default statistics are NOT collected. One needs to set rocksdb_perf_context_level to some value (e.g. 3) to enable collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不收集统计信息。需要将 rocksdb_perf_context_level 设置为某个值（例如3）以启用收集。

trans-unit.source: By default statistics are not collected. This is to ensure that statistics collection does not cause any extra load on the server unless desired.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,统计信息不会被收集。这是为了确保统计收集不会对服务器造成任何额外的负载,除非需要。

trans-unit.source: By default the plugin tries to use ColumnStore's default configuration /usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/etc/Columnstore.xml to connect to the ColumnStore instance through the Bulk Write SDK. In addition, individual paths or variables can be used too.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，插件尝试使用ColumnStore的默认配置/usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/etc/Columnstore.xml通过Bulk Write SDK连接到ColumnStore实例。此外，也可以使用单个路径或变量。

trans-unit.source: By default the switches join_cache_incremental, join_cache_hashed, join_cache_bka are set to 'on'. However it does not mean that by default any of block-based join algorithms is allowed to be used. All of them are allowed only if the system variable join_cache_level is set to 8. This variable can take an integer value in the interval from 0 to 8.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，开关 join_cache_incremental ， join_cache_hashed ， join_cache_bka 设置为“ on”。但是，这并不意味着默认情况下允许使用任何基于块的连接算法。仅当系统变量join_cache_level设置为8时，才允许使用所有这些变量。此变量可以采用0到8之间的整数值。

trans-unit.source: By default with autocommit on it will internally stream the data to an instance of the cpimport process. This requires some memory overhead on the UM server so may be less reliable than cpimport for very large imports.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,当自动提交开启时,它将在内部把数据流转到一个 cpimport 进程的实例。这需要UM服务器上的一些内存开销,所以对于非常大的导入,可能不如cpimport可靠。

trans-unit.source: By default, A comes before Z, so the following evaluates to true:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， A 在 Z 之前，因此以下结果为true：

trans-unit.source: By default, FLUSH statements are written to the binary log and will be replicated. The NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG keyword (LOCAL is an alias) will ensure the statement is not written to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， FLUSH 语句被写入二进制日志，并将被复制。该 NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG 关键字（ LOCAL 是一个别名），将确保该语句不写入二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: By default, OPTIMIZE TABLE statements are written to the binary log and will be replicated. The NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG keyword (LOCAL is an alias) will ensure the statement is not written to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， OPTIMIZE TABLE 语句被写入二进制日志，并将被复制。该 NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG 关键字（ LOCAL 是一个别名），将确保该语句不写入二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: By default, REPAIR TABLE statements are written to the binary log and will be replicated. The NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG keyword (LOCAL is an alias) will ensure the statement is not written to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， REPAIR TABLE 语句被写入二进制日志，并将被复制。该 NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG 关键字（ LOCAL 是一个别名），将确保该语句不写入二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: By default, REPAIR VIEW statements are written to the binary log and will be replicated. The NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG keyword (LOCAL is an alias) will ensure the statement is not written to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， REPAIR VIEW 语句被写入二进制日志，并将被复制。该 NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG 关键字（ LOCAL 是一个别名），将确保该语句不写入二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: By default, SHOW PROFILE displays Status and Duration columns. The Status values are like the State values displayed by SHOW PROCESSLIST, although there might be some minor differences in interpretation for the two statements for some status values (see http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/thread-information.html).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， SHOW PROFILE 显示“状态”和“持续时间”列。状态值类似于 SHOW PROCESSLIST 显示的状态值，尽管对于某些状态值，这两个语句的解释可能略有不同（请参见http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/ thread-information.html）。

trans-unit.source: By default, SHOW PROFILE displays Status and Duration columns. The Status values are like the State values displayed by SHOW PROCESSLIST, although there might be some minor differences in interpretation for the two statements for some status values (see http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/thread-information.html).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， SHOW PROFILE 显示“状态”和“持续时间”列。状态值类似于 SHOW PROCESSLIST 显示的状态值，尽管对于某些状态值，这两个语句的解释可能略有不同（请参见http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/ thread-information.html）。

trans-unit.source: By default, mysqld_safe tries to start an executable named mysqld.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， mysqld_safe 尝试启动名为 mysqld 的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, mysqld_safe will look for the datadir in the following locations in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， mysqld_safe 将按照以下顺序在以下位置查找 datadir ：

trans-unit.source: By default, ANALYZE TABLE statements are written to the binary log and will be replicated. The NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG keyword (LOCAL is an alias) will ensure the statement is not written to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ANALYZE TABLE语句被写入二进制日志，并将被复制。该 NO_WRITE_TO_BINLOG 关键字（ LOCAL 是一个别名），将确保该语句不写入二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASCII '\0' is disallowed and '\r\n' is translated to '\n'. This switch turns off both features, and also turns off parsing of all client commands except \C and DELIMITER, in non-interactive mode (for input piped to mysql or loaded using the 'source' command). This is necessary when processing output from mysqlbinlog that may contain blobs.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不允许使用ASCII'\ 0'并将'\ r \ n'转换为'\ n'。此开关将关闭这两个功能，并且还将关闭非交互模式下（\ C和DELIMITER除外）的所有客户端命令的解析（用于通过管道传输到mysql或使用“ source”命令加载的输入）。处理来自可能包含斑点的mysqlbinlog的输出时，这是必需的。

trans-unit.source: By default, Galera Cluster replicates data between each node without encrypting it. This is generally acceptable when the cluster nodes runs on the same host or in networks where security is guaranteed through other means. However, in cases where the cluster nodes exist on separate networks or they are in a high-risk network, the lack of encryption does introduce security concerns as a malicious actor could potentially eavesdrop on the traffic as it is sent over the network between them.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,Galera Cluster会在每个节点之间复制数据而不进行加密。当集群节点运行在同一台主机上或在通过其他方式保证安全的网络中时,这通常是可以接受的。但是,如果集群节点存在于不同的网络中,或者它们处于高风险网络中,缺乏加密确实会带来安全问题,因为恶意行为者可能会窃听它们之间通过网络发送的流量。

trans-unit.source: By default, InnoDB deliberately crashes the server when it detects table corruption. The reason for this behavior is preventing corruption propagation. However, in some situations, server availability is more important than data integrity. For this reason, we can avoid these crashes by changing the value of innodb_corrupt_table_action to 'warn'.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，InnoDB在检测到表损坏时会故意使服务器崩溃。此行为的原因是防止损坏传播。但是，在某些情况下，服务器可用性比数据完整性更为重要。因此，我们可以通过将innodb_corrupt_table_action的值更改为'warn' 来避免这些崩溃。

trans-unit.source: By default, InnoDB's file-per-table tablespaces are created in the system's data directory, which is defined by the datadir system variable. If you want to store InnoDB data separate from the data for other storage engines, then you change this by setting the the innodb_data_home_dir system variable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，InnoDB的每表文件表空间在系统的数据目录中创建，该目录由 datadir 系统变量定义。如果要将InnoDB数据与其他存储引擎的数据分开存储，则可以通过设置 innodb_data_home_dir 系统变量来更改此设置。

trans-unit.source: By default, MariaDB permits partitioning. You can determine this by using the SHOW PLUGINS statement, for example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，MariaDB允许分区。您可以使用SHOW PLUGINS语句来确定这一点，例如：

trans-unit.source: By default, MariaDB replicates data between masters and slaves without encrypting it. This is generally acceptable when the master and slave run are in networks where security is guaranteed through other means. However, in cases where the master and slave exist on separate networks or they are in a high-risk network, the lack of encryption does introduce security concerns as a malicious actor could potentially eavesdrop on the traffic as it is sent over the network between them.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,MariaDB在主从之间复制数据时不会对数据进行加密。当主、从机运行在网络中,通过其他方式保证安全时,这种做法一般是可以接受的。但是,当主从机存在于不同的网络中,或者它们处于高风险的网络中时,缺乏加密确实会带来安全问题,因为恶意行为者可能会窃听它们之间通过网络发送的流量。

trans-unit.source: By default, MariaDB runs with autocommit mode enabled. This means that as soon as you execute a statement that updates (modifies) a table, MariaDB stores the update on disk to make it permanent. To disable autocommit mode, use the following statement:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，MariaDB在启用自动提交模式的情况下运行。这意味着一旦您执行一条更新（修改）表的语句，MariaDB就会将更新存储在磁盘上以使其永久化。要禁用自动提交模式，请使用以下语句：

trans-unit.source: By default, MariaDB transmits data between the server and clients without encrypting it. This is generally acceptable when the server and client run on the same host or in networks where security is guaranteed through other means. However, in cases where the server and client exist on separate networks or they are in a high-risk network, the lack of encryption does introduce security concerns as a malicious actor could potentially eavesdrop on the traffic as it is sent over the network between them.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,MariaDB在服务器和客户端之间传输数据时,不会对数据进行加密。当服务器和客户端运行在同一台主机上或在通过其他方式保证安全的网络中时,这通常是可以接受的。然而,当服务器和客户端存在于不同的网络中,或者它们处于高风险的网络中时,缺乏加密确实会带来安全问题,因为恶意行为者可能会窃听它们之间通过网络发送的流量。

trans-unit.source: By default, a function is associated with the current database. To associate the function explicitly with a given database, specify the fully-qualified name as db_name.func_name when you create it. If the function name is the same as the name of a built-in function, you must use the fully qualified name when you call it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，函数与当前数据库关联。要将函数与给定数据库显式关联，请将完全限定的名称指定为 db_name.func_name 创建时为func_name。如果函数名称与内置函数的名称相同，则在调用它时必须使用标准名称。

trans-unit.source: By default, all changes to data or data structure are logged. This behavior can be changed by starting the server with the --binlog-ignore-db=database_name or --binlog-do-db=database_nameoptions.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将记录对数据或数据结构的所有更改。可以通过使用 --binlog-ignore-db=database_name 或 --binlog-do-db=database_name 选项启动服务器来更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, all logs are disabled or written into files. The general query log and the slow query log can also be written to special tables in the mysql database. During the startup, entries will always be written into files.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有日志都被禁用或写入文件中。也可以将常规查询日志和慢速查询日志写入 mysql 数据库的特殊表中。在启动过程中，条目将始终写入文件中。

trans-unit.source: By default, all sync points are inactive. They do nothing (except to burn a couple of CPU cycles for checking if they are active).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,所有的同步点都是不活跃的。它们什么都不做(除了消耗几个CPU周期来检查它们是否处于活动状态)。

trans-unit.source: By default, an OPTIMIZE TABLE will defragment a table. In order to use it to update fulltext index statistics, the innodb_optimize_fulltext_only system variable must be set to 1. This is intended to be a temporary setting, and should be reset to 0 once the fulltext index has been re-organized.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，OPTIMIZE TABLE将对表进行碎片整理。为了使用它来更新全文索引统计信息，必须将innodb_optimize_fulltext_only系统变量设置为 1 。这是一个临时设置，一旦重新组织了全文索引，则应将其重置为 0 。

trans-unit.source: By default, before a new SST is started, existing mariabackup SST log files are compressed and moved to /tmp/sst_log_archive. This behavior can be disabled by setting sst-log-archive=0 in the [sst]option group in an option file. Similarly, the archive directory can be changed by setting sst-log-archive-dir. For example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在启动新的SST之前，将现有 mariabackup SST日志文件压缩并移动到 /tmp/sst_log_archive 。可以通过在选项文件的 [sst] 选项组中设置 sst-log-archive=0 来禁用此行为。同样，可以通过设置 sst-log-archive-dir 来更改存档目录。例如：

trans-unit.source: By default, comparisons are case-insensitive:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,比较是不区分大小写的。

trans-unit.source: By default, compression is turned on in ColumnStore. In addition, you can enable or disable it at the table-level or column-level, or control it at the session-level by setting the infinidb_compression_type system variable. When enabled, ColumnStore uses snappy compression.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在ColumnStore中启用压缩。此外，您可以在表级别或列级别启用或禁用它，或者通过设置 infinidb_compression_type 系统变量在会话级别进行控制。启用后，ColumnStore使用快速压缩。

trans-unit.source: By default, gcomm listens on all interfaces. The port is either provided in the cluster address, or will default to 4567 if not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,gcomm监听所有接口。该端口在群集地址中提供,如果没有设置,则默认为4567。

trans-unit.source: By default, group commit for Aria is turned off. It is controlled by the aria_group_commit and aria_group_commit_interval system variables.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，关闭针对Aria的组提交。它由aria_group_commit和aria_group_commit_interval系统变量控制。

trans-unit.source: By default, if thread_pool_priority is set to auto, then queries would be given a higher priority, in case the current connection is inside a transaction. This allows the running transaction to finish faster, and has the effect of lowering the number of transactions running in parallel. The default setting will generally improve throughput for transactional workloads. But it is also possible to explicitly set the priority for the current connection to either 'high' or 'low'.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果 thread_pool_priority 设置为 auto ，则在当前连接位于事务内部的情况下，将赋予查询更高的优先级。这样可以使运行中的事务更快地完成，并具有减少并行运行的事务数的效果。默认设置通常会提高事务性工作负载的吞吐量。但是也可以将当前连接的优先级显式设置为“高”或“低”。

trans-unit.source: By default, if a GROUP BY clause is present, the rows in the output will be sorted by the expressions used in the GROUP BY. You can also specify ASC or DESC (ascending, descending) after those expressions, like in ORDER BY. The default is ASC.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果存在 GROUP BY 子句，则输出中的行将按 GROUP BY 中使用的表达式排序。您还可以在这些表达式之后指定 ASC 或 DESC （升序，降序），例如在ORDER BY中。默认值为 ASC 。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果您尝试插入重复的行并且有一个 UNIQUE 索引，则 INSERT 停止，并产生如下错误：

trans-unit.source: By default, it will look for mysqld in the following locations in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它将按照以下顺序在以下位置查找 mysqld ：

trans-unit.source: By default, logging is set to OFF. To enable it, set the server_audit_logging variable to ON. Note that if the query cache is enabled, and a query is returned from the query cache, no TABLE records will appear in the log since the server didn't open or access any tables and instead relied on the cached results. So you may want to disable query caching.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，日志记录设置为 OFF 。要启用它，请将server_audit_logging变量设置为 ON 。请注意，如果启用了查询缓存，并且从查询缓存返回查询，则由于服务器未打开或访问任何表而是依赖于缓存的结果，因此不会在日志中出现任何 TABLE 记录。因此，您可能要禁用查询缓存。

trans-unit.source: By default, myisamchk will use very little memory (about 3MB is allocated), but can temporarily use a lot of disk space. If disk space is a limitation when repairing, the --safe-recover option should be used instead of --recover. However, if TMPDIR points to a memory file system, an out of memory error can easily be caused, as myisamchk places temporary files in TMPDIR. The --tmpdir=path option should be used in this case to specify a directory on disk.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，myisamchk将仅使用很少的内存（已分配约3MB），但可以临时使用大量磁盘空间。如果修复时磁盘空间有限，则应使用--safe-recover选项代替--recover。但是，如果TMPDIR指向内存文件系统，则容易造成内存不足错误，因为myisamchk将临时文件放置在TMPDIR中。该--tmpdir =路径选择应该在这种情况下被用来指定磁盘上的目录。

trans-unit.source: By default, on the donor node, it logs to innobackup.backup.log. This log file is located in the datadir.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在施主节点上，它记录到 innobackup.backup.log 。该日志文件位于 datadir 中。

trans-unit.source: By default, on the donor node, it logs to mariabackup.backup.log. This log file is located in the datadir.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在施主节点上，它记录到 mariabackup.backup.log 。该日志文件位于 datadir 中。

trans-unit.source: By default, on the joiner node, it logs to innobackup.prepare.log and innobackup.move.log. These log files are located in the .sst directory, which is a hidden directory inside the datadir.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在 innobackup.prepare.log 节点上，它记录到innobackup.prepare.log和 innobackup.move.log 。这些日志文件位于 .sst 目录中，该目录是 datadir 内部的隐藏目录。

trans-unit.source: By default, on the joiner node, it logs to mariabackup.prepare.log and mariabackup.move.log These log files are also located in the datadir.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它在 mariabackup.prepare.log 节点上记录到mariabackup.prepare.log和 mariabackup.move.log 这些日志文件也位于 datadir 中。

trans-unit.source: By default, pivot tries to call the currently used server using host=localhost, user=root not using password, and port=3306. However, this may not be what is needed, in particular if the local root user has a password in which case you can get an “access denied” error message when creating or using the pivot table.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，pivot尝试使用host = localhost，user = root（不使用密码）和port = 3306调用当前使用的服务器。但是，这可能不是必需的，尤其是如果本地root用户具有密码，在这种情况下，创建或使用数据透视表时，您会收到“拒绝访问”错误消息。

trans-unit.source: By default, the ! operator has a higher precedence. If the HIGH_NOT_PRECEDENCESQL_MODE flag is set, NOT and ! have the same precedence.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， ! 运算符具有更高的优先级。如果设置了 HIGH_NOT_PRECEDENCE SQL_MODE标志，则 NOT 和 ! 具有相同的优先级。

trans-unit.source: By default, the ^ and $ assertions have the same meaning with \A, \Z, and \z. However, the meanings of ^ and $ can change in multiline mode (see below). By contrast, the meanings of \A, \Z, and \z are always the same; they are independent of the multiline mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， ^ 和 $ 断言与 \A ， \Z 和 \z 具有相同的含义。但是， ^ 和 $ 的含义可以在多行模式下更改（请参见下文）。相比之下， \A ， \Z 和 \z 的含义始终相同；它们独立于多行模式。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， pam_user_map PAM模块不执行任何日志记录。但是，如果要启用调试日志记录，则可以将 debug 模块参数添加到服务的PAM配置文件中。例如：

trans-unit.source: By default, the plugin-load option is commented out. Simply un-comment it as in the example above.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， plugin-load 选项被注释掉。只需取消上面示例中的注释即可。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Slow Query Log only logs slow non-administrative statements. To log administrative statements, set the log_slow_admin_statements system variable. The Slow Query Log considers the following statements administrative: ALTER TABLE, ANALYZE TABLE, CHECK TABLE, CREATE INDEX, DROP INDEX, OPTIMIZE TABLE, and REPAIR TABLE. In MariaDB 10.3 and later, this also includes ALTER SEQUENCE statements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，慢速查询日志仅记录慢速非管理语句。要记录管理语句，请设置 log_slow_admin_statements 系统变量。慢查询日志认为以下语句具有管理性： ALTER TABLE ， ANALYZE TABLE ， CHECK TABLE ， CREATE INDEX ， DROP INDEX ， OPTIMIZE TABLE 和 REPAIR TABLE 。在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，它还包括 ALTER SEQUENCE 语句。

trans-unit.source: By default, the position of the first character in the string from which the substring is to be extracted is reckoned as 1. For Oracle-compatibility, from MariaDB 10.3.3, when sql_mode is set to 'oracle', position zero is treated as position 1 (although the first character is still reckoned as 1).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将从中提取子字符串的字符串中第一个字符的位置计算为1。对于Oracle兼容性，从MariaDB 10.3.3开始，当sql_mode设置为'oracle'时，零位置被视为位置1（尽管第一个字符仍被视为1）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the relay log will be given a name host_name-relay-bin.nnnnnn, with host_name referring to the server's host name, and #nnnnnn the sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，中继日志将被赋予名称 host_name-relay-bin.nnnnnn ，其中 host_name 指服务器的主机名，而#nnnnnn则 the sequence number.

trans-unit.source: By default, the repetition quantifiers ?, *, + and {n,m} are "greedy", that is, they try to match as much as possible. Adding a question mark after a repetition quantifier makes it "non-greedy", so the pattern matches the minimum number of times possible.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，重复量词 ? ， * ， + 和 {n,m} 是“贪婪的”，也就是说，它们尝试尽可能地匹配。在重复量词之后添加问号会使它“非贪婪”，因此该模式匹配了可能的最小次数。

trans-unit.source: By default, the script will configure your system to install from the repository of the latest GA version of MariaDB MaxScale. That is currently MariaDB MaxScale 2.4. If a new major GA release occurs and you would like to upgrade to it, then you will need to either manually edit the repository configuration file to point to the new version, or run the MariaDB Package Repository setup script again.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,该脚本将配置你的系统从最新的GA版本的MariaDB MaxScale的存储库中安装。目前是MariaDB MaxScale 2.4。如果发生了新的主要GA版本,而你想升级到它,那么你将需要手动编辑版本库配置文件指向新的版本,或者再次运行MariaDB Package Repository设置脚本。

trans-unit.source: By default, the script will configure your system to install from the repository of the latest GA version of MariaDB. That is currently MariaDB 10.3. If a new major GA release occurs and you would like to upgrade to it, then you will need to either manually edit the repository configuration file to point to the new version, or run the MariaDB Package Repository setup script again.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该脚本会将您的系统配置为从最新的GA版本的MariaDB的存储库安装。当前是MariaDB 10.3。如果出现新的主要GA版本，并且您想升级到该版本，则需要手动编辑存储库配置文件以指向新版本，或者再次运行MariaDB软件包存储库设置脚本。

trans-unit.source: By default, the script will configure your system to install from the repository of the latest GA version of MariaDB. That is currently MariaDB 10.4. If a new major GA release occurs and you would like to upgrade to it, then you will need to either manually edit the repository configuration file to point to the new version, or run the MariaDB Package Repository setup script again.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该脚本会将您的系统配置为从最新的GA版本的MariaDB的存储库安装。当前是MariaDB 10.4。如果出现新的主要GA版本，并且您想升级到该版本，则需要手动编辑存储库配置文件以指向新版本，或者再次运行MariaDB软件包存储库设置脚本。

trans-unit.source: By default, the slow query log is written to ${hostname}-slow.log in the datadir directory. However, this can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，慢速查询日志写入 datadir 目录中的 ${hostname}-slow.log 。但是，可以更改。

trans-unit.source: By default, the system limits how many open file descriptors a process can have open at one time. It has both a soft and hard limit. On many systems, both the soft and hard limit default to 1024. On an active database server, it is very easy to exceed 1024 open file descriptors. Therefore, you may need to increase the soft and hard limits. There are a few ways to do so.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,系统会限制一个进程在同一时间可以打开多少个文件描述符。它有一个软限制和硬限制。在许多系统中,软限制和硬限制都默认为1024。在一个活跃的数据库服务器上,很容易超过1024个打开的文件描述符。因此,您可能需要增加软、硬限制。有几种方法可以做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: By default, the system limits the size of core files that could be created. It has both a soft and hard limit. On many systems, the soft limit defaults to 0. If you want to enable core dumps, then you may need to increase this. Therefore, you may need to increase the soft and hard limits. There are a few ways to do so.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，系统限制可以创建的核心文件的大小。它具有软限制和硬限制。在许多系统上，软限制默认为0。如果要启用核心转储，则可能需要增加该值。因此，您可能需要增加软限制和硬限制。有几种方法可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: By default, the unit file for the service will be installed in a directory defined at build time by the INSTALL_SYSTEMD_UNITDIR option provided to cmake.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，服务的单位文件将安装在构建时由 cmake 提供的 INSTALL_SYSTEMD_UNITDIR 选项定义的目录中。

trans-unit.source: By default, these time zone tables in the mysql database are created, but not populated.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将创建 mysql 数据库中的这些时区表，但不会填充它们。

trans-unit.source: By default, this allocation is done for a maximum return line number of:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这种分配方式的最大返回行数为:。

trans-unit.source: By default, with row-based replication, triggers run on the master, and the effects of their executions are replicated to the slaves. However, starting from MariaDB 10.1.1, it is possible to run triggers on the slaves. See Running triggers on the slave for Row-based events.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在基于行的复制中，触发器在主服务器上运行，其执行的效果被复制到从服务器上。但是，从MariaDB 10.1.1开始，可以在从服务器上运行触发器。请参阅在从属服务器上为基于行的事件运行触发器。

trans-unit.source: By design, the EXTRACTVALUE() function makes no distinction between a match on an empty element and no match at all. If you need to determine whether no matching element was found in the XML fragment or if an element was found that contained no child text nodes, use the XPath count() function.
trans-unit.target: 按照设计， EXTRACTVALUE() 函数在空元素上的匹配与完全不匹配之间没有区别。如果需要确定在XML片段中没有找到匹配的元素，还是发现没有包含子文本节点的元素，请使用XPath count() 函数。

trans-unit.source: By enabling the File Key Management plugin and setting the appropriate path on the file_key_management_filename system variable, you can begin using the plugin to manage your encryption keys. But, there is a security risk in doing so, given that the keys are stored in plain text on your system. You can reduce this exposure using file permissions, but it's better to encrypt the whole key file to further restrict access.
trans-unit.target: 通过启用文件密钥管理插件并在 file_key_management_filename 系统变量上设置适当的路径，您可以开始使用该插件来管理您的加密密钥。但是，这样做的做法存在安全风险，因为密钥以纯文本格式存储在系统中。您可以使用文件权限来减少这种暴露，但是最好对整个密钥文件进行加密以进一步限制访问。

trans-unit.target: 通过让索引是非UNIQUE,延迟的数据只是作为额外的行显示出来。

trans-unit.source: By isolating this as its own transaction, we get it finished in a hurry, thereby minimizing blocking. By saying IGNORE, we don't care if other threads are 'simultaneously' inserting the same host_names.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其隔离为自己的事务,我们可以快速完成它,从而将阻塞降到最低。通过说 IGNORE,我们不在乎其他线程是否 "同时 "插入相同的 host_names。

trans-unit.source: By now, you may have discovered why it works.

trans-unit.source: By setting both MariaDB Server's TLS-related system variables and Galera Cluster's TLS-related wsrep_provider_options, the server can secure both external client connections and Galera Cluster's replication traffic.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置MariaDB服务器的TLS相关系统变量和Galera Cluster的TLS相关wsrep_provider_options,服务器可以保证外部客户端连接和Galera Cluster的复制流量安全。

trans-unit.source: By the way, does this ring a bell? It shows that in a way PIVOT tables are doing the opposite of what OCCUR tables do.
trans-unit.target: 顺便说一下,这是否有印象?它表明,在某种程度上,PIVOT表的作用与OCCUR表的作用正好相反。

trans-unit.source: By using max_statement_time in conjunction with SET STATEMENT, it is possible to limit the execution time of individual queries. For example:
trans-unit.target: 通过将 max_statement_time 与 SET STATEMENT 结合使用，可以限制单个查询的执行时间。例如：

trans-unit.source: By using GC distance, not Pythagoras, distances are 'correct' even near poles.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用GC距离,而不是毕达哥拉斯,即使在极点附近,距离也是 "正确的"。

trans-unit.target: 通过使用IGNORE关键字，所有错误都将转换为警告，这不会停止插入其他行。

trans-unit.target: 已分配但未使用的字节。对于共享表空间中的InnoDB表，共享表空间的可用空间具有很小的安全裕度。对于分区表的估计-请参阅 PARTITIONS 表。

trans-unit.target: 通过读取操作读取的字节。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the data log files. This data is transfered from the data log buffer (pbxt_log_buffer_size) to the data log files (.dlog), when the buffer is full, or on commit.
trans-unit.target: 写入数据日志文件的字节数。当缓冲区满了或提交时,这些数据会从数据日志缓冲区(pbxt_log_buffer_size)传输到数据日志文件(.dlog)。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the index files. This data is transfered from the index log files (ilog) to the index files (xti), during a consistent flush of the index.
trans-unit.target: 写入索引文件的字节数。这些数据在索引一致刷新期间从索引日志文件(ilog)传输到索引文件(xti)。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the index log files. This data is transfered from the index cache in main memory to the index log files (ilog) during a consistent flush of the index.
trans-unit.target: 写入索引日志文件的字节。这些数据在索引一致刷新期间从主内存的索引缓存中传输到索引日志文件(ilog)。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the record/row files. This data is transfered from the transaction logs to the handle data (xtd) and the row index files (xtr).
trans-unit.target: 写入记录/行文件的字节。这些数据从事务日志转到手柄数据(xtd)和行索引文件(xtr)。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the transaction log files. This is data transfered from the transaction log buffer (pbxt_transaction_buffer_size) to the transaction log files (.xlog). This transfer occurs on commit or when the transaction log buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 写入事务日志文件的字节数。这是从事务日志缓冲区(pbxt_transaction_buffer_size)传输到事务日志文件(.xlog)的数据。这种传输发生在提交时或事务日志缓冲区满时。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the transaction log since the last checkpoint
trans-unit.target: 自上次检查点以来写入交易日志的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the transaction log, still to be read by the Sweeper thread
trans-unit.target: 写入事务日志的字节,仍由扫码器线程读取。

trans-unit.source: Bytes written to the transaction log, still to be written to the database
trans-unit.target: 写入交易日志的字节数,仍将写入数据库

CLASS_ORIGIN indicates whether the SQLSTATE uses a standard class or a software-specific class. If it is defined in the SQL standards document ISO 9075-2 (section 24.1, SQLSTATE), this property's value is supposed to be 'ISO 9075', otherwise it is supposed to be 'MySQL'. However, any string is accepted.

trans-unit.source: CONNECT can handle very many table formats; it is indeed one of its main features. The Type option specifies the type and format of the table. The Type options available values and their descriptions are listed in the following table:

trans-unit.source: CONNECT can make and process some tables whose data file is compressed. The only supported compression format is the gzlib format. Zip and zlib formats are supported differently. The table types that can be compressed are DOS, FIX, BIN, CSV and FMT. This can save some disk space at the cost of a somewhat longer processing time.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT可以创建和处理一些数据文件已压缩的表。唯一受支持的压缩格式是gzlib格式。对Zip和zlib格式的支持不同。可以压缩的表类型为DOS，FIX，BIN，CSV和FMT。这样可以节省一些磁盘空间，但要花费更长的处理时间。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT cannot "invent" sub-tags that are not part of the xsamp table. Because these sub-tags do not exist, the xsampall table cannot retrieve the information that should be attached to them. If we want to be able to query the XML file by all the defined tables, the correct way to insert a new book to the file is to use the xsampall table, the only one that addresses all the components of the original document:
trans-unit.target: CONNECT不能“发明”不属于xsamp表的子标签。由于这些子标记不存在，因此xsampall表无法检索应附加到它们的信息。如果我们希望能够通过所有已定义的表查询XML文件，则将新书插入文件的正确方法是使用xsampall表，这是唯一处理原始文档所有组件的表：

trans-unit.source: CONNECT cannot perform block indexing on case insensitive character columns. To force block indexing on a character column, specify its charset as not case insensitive, for instance as binary. However this will also apply to all other clauses, this column being now case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT不能在不区分大小写的字符列上执行块索引。要在字符列上强制执行块索引,请将其字符集指定为不区分大小写,例如二进制。然而,这也将适用于所有其他子句,这列现在是大小写敏感的。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT dBASE III or IV tables
CONNECT data types

CONNECT directly works on character strings impersonating JSON values with the need of parsing them all the time but with the advantage of working easily on external data. Generally, this is not too penalizing because JSON data are often of some or reasonable size. The only case where it can be a serious problem is when working on a big JSON file.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT直接工作在冒充JSON值的字符串上,需要一直解析,但优点是可以方便地工作在外部数据上。一般来说,这并不会造成太大的惩罚,因为JSON数据通常都有一定或合理的大小。唯一可能成为严重问题的情况是在处理一个大的JSON文件时。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT does not directly support INSERT commands such as:
CONNECT engine windows

CONNECT handles null values for data sources able to produce nulls. Currently this concerns mainly the ODBC, JDBC, MONGO, MYSQL, XML, JSON and INI table types. For INI, JSON, MONGO or XML types, null values are returned when the key is missing in the section (INI) or when the corresponding node does not exist in a row (XML, JSON, MONGO).
trans-unit.target: CONNECT处理能够产生空值的数据源的空值。当前，这主要涉及ODBC，JDBC，MONGO，MYSQL，XML，JSON和INI表类型。对于INI，JSON，MONGO或XML类型，当部分（INI）中缺少键或行中不存在相应的节点（XML，JSON，MONGO）时，将返回空值。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT handles dates from 13 December 1901, 20:45:52 to 18 January 2038, 19:14:07.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT处理日期从1901年12月13日20:45:52到2038年1月18日19:14:07。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT handles only types that are stored as characters.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT只处理存储为字符的类型。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT is able to convert data from one type to another in most cases. These conversions are done without warning even when this leads to truncation or loss of precision. This is true, in particular, for tables of type ODBC, JDBC, MYSQL and PROXY (via MySQL) because the source table may contain some data types not supported by CONNECT. They are converted when possible to CONNECT types.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT能够在大多数情况下将数据从一种类型转换为另一种类型。即使这些转换会导致截断或损失精度,也不会发出警告。特别是对于ODBC、JDBC、MYSQL和PROXY(通过MySQL)类型的表来说更是如此,因为源表可能包含一些CONNECT不支持的数据类型。在可能的情况下,它们会被转换为CONNECT类型。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT is able to test whether a PROXY, or PROXY-based, table refers directly or indirectly to itself. If a direct reference can tested at table creation, an indirect reference can only be tested when executing a query on the table. However, this is possible only for local tables. When using remote tables or views, a problem can occur if the remote table or the view refers back to one of the local tables of the chain. The same caution should be used than when using FEDERATEDX tables.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT能够测试 PROXY 或基于 PROXY 的表是直接引用还是间接引用自身。如果可以在创建表时测试直接引用，则仅当在表上执行查询时才能测试间接引用。但是，这仅适用于本地表。使用远程表或视图时，如果远程表或视图引用链中的本地表之一，则可能会出现问题。与使用 FEDERATEDX 表时应注意相同的注意事项。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT is not just a new “YASE” (Yet another Storage Engine) that provides another way to store data with additional features. It brings a new dimension to MariaDB, already one of the best products to deal with traditional database transactional applications, further into the world of business intelligence and data analysis, including NoSQL facilities. Indeed, BI is the set of techniques and tools for the transformation of raw data into meaningful and useful information. And where is this data?
trans-unit.target: CONNECT不仅仅是一个新的“ YASE”（还有另一个存储引擎），它提供了另一种方式来存储具有附加功能的数据。它为已经成为处理传统数据库事务应用程序的最佳产品之一的MariaDB带来了新的维度，进一步扩展到了包括NoSQL功能在内的商业智能和数据分析领域。确实，BI是将原始数据转换为有意义和有用的信息的技术和工具集。这些数据在哪里？

trans-unit.source: CONNECT leaves the decision to you. When declaring a column in the CREATE TABLE statement, if it is declared NOT NULL, blank or zero values will be considered as valid values. Otherwise they will be considered as NULL values. In all cases, nulls are replaced on insert or update by pseudo null values, a zero-length character string for text types or a zero value for numeric types. Once converted to pseudo null values, they will be recognized as NULL only for columns declared as nullable.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT由您决定。在CREATE TABLE语句中声明一列时，如果将其声明为NOT NULL，则空白或零值将被视为有效值。否则，它们将被视为NULL值。在所有情况下，在插入或更新时，空值都会被伪空值，文本类型的零长度字符串或数字类型的零值替换。一旦转换为伪空值，则仅对于声明为可空的列，它们将被识别为NULL。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT lets you view it as a table in two different ways.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT可以让您以两种不同的方式将其视为一个表格。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT offers two ways to specify this information:
trans-unit.target: CONNECT提供两种方式来指定这些信息。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT plain DOS or UNIX data files.

CONNECT provide additional wrappers whose files are located in the CONNECT source directory. The wrapper to use can be specified in the global variable connect_java_wrapper, which defaults to “JdbcInterface”.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT提供其他包装器，这些包装器的文件位于CONNECT源目录中。可以在全局变量connect_java_wrapper中指定要使用的包装，默认为“ JdbcInterface”。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT provides four indexing types:
CONNECT provides two integral VEC formats, in which each column's data is adjacent.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT提供了两种完整的VEC格式,其中每一列的数据是相邻的。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT requires the FILE privilege for "outward" tables

CONNECT standard indexes are created and used as the ones of other storage engines although they have a specific internal format. The CONNECT handler supports the use of standard indexes for most of the file based table types.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT标准索引与其他存储引擎的索引一样被创建和使用,尽管它们有一个特定的内部格式。CONNECT处理程序支持对大多数基于文件的表类型使用标准索引。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT supports MariaDB virtual and persistent columns. It is also possible to declare a column as being a CONNECT special column. Let us see on an example how this can be done. The boys table we have seen previously can be recreated as:
trans-unit.target: CONNECT支持MariaDB 虚拟列和持久列。也可以将一列声明为CONNECT特殊列。让我们看一个例子，如何做到这一点。我们之前看到的boys表可以重新创建为：

trans-unit.source: CONNECT supports tables represented by XML files. For these tables, the standard input/output functions of the operating system are not used but the parsing and processing of the file is delegated to a specialized library. Currently two such systems are supported: libxml2, a part of the GNOME framework, but which does not require GNOME and, on Windows, MS-DOM (DOMDOC), the Microsoft standard support of XML documents.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT支持用XML文件表示的表格。对于这些表格,不使用操作系统的标准输入/输出功能,而是将文件的解析和处理委托给一个专门的库。目前支持两个这样的系统:libxml2,是GNOME框架的一部分,但它不需要GNOME;在Windows上,MS-DOM(DOMDOC),微软对XML文件的标准支持。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT supports the MySQL/MariaDB partition specification. It is done similar to the way MyISAM or InnoDB do by using the PARTITION engine that must be enabled for this to work. This type of partitioning is sometimes referred as “horizontal partitioning”.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT支持MySQL / MariaDB分区规范。通过使用必须启用此功能的PARTITION引擎，可以完成与MyISAM或InnoDB相似的操作。有时将这种分区称为“水平分区”。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT tables based on text files
CONNECT takes this notion a step further, by providing two types of partitioning:
trans-unit.target: CONNECT通过提供两种类型的分区,使这一概念更进一步。

trans-unit.source: CONNECT will analyze the where clause and only read the xt1 table. This can save time if you want to retrieve only a few sub-tables from a TBL table containing many sub-tables.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT将分析where子句，仅读取xt1表。如果您只想从包含许多子表的TBL表中检索几个子表，则可以节省时间。

trans-unit.source: CONTINUE
CONTINUE handler:

CONTINUE handlers have one additional problem: They are parsed at the lexical level where they occur, so variable offsets will assume that it's actually called at that level. However, a handler might be invoked from a sub-block where additional local variables have been declared, which will then share the location of any local variables in the handler itself. So, when calling a CONTINUE handler, we need to save any local variables above the handler's frame offset, and restore them upon return. (This is not a problem for EXIT handlers, since they will leave the block anyway.) This is taken care of by the execution loop and the sp_instr_hreturn instruction.
trans-unit.target: CONTINUE处理程序有一个额外的问题:它们是在它们出现的词法层次上被解析的,所以变量偏移将假定它实际上是在该层次上被调用的。然而,一个处理程序可能会从一个已经声明了额外的局部变量的子块中被调用,然后它将共享处理程序本身中任何局部变量的位置。因此,当调用CONTINUE处理程序时,我们需要保存处理程序的帧偏移量以上的任何局部变量,并在返回时恢复它们。(这对 EXIT 处理程序来说不是问题,因为它们无论如何都会离开块。)这一点由执行循环和sp_instr_hreturn指令来处理。

CREATE SEQUENCE
CREATE SEQUENCE requires the CREATE privilege.
CREATE SEQUENCE was introduced in MariaDB 10.3.

CREATE SEQUENCE will create a sequence that generates new values when called with NEXT VALUE FOR sequence_name. It's an alternative to AUTO INCREMENT when one wants to have more control of how the numbers are generated. As the SEQUENCE caches values (up to CACHE) it can in some cases be much faster than AUTO INCREMENT. Another benefit is that one can access the last value generated by all used sequences, which solves one of the limitations with LAST_INSERT_ID().
trans-unit.target: 当使用 NEXT VALUE FOR sequence_name 调用时，CREATE SEQUENCE将创建一个生成新值的序列。当人们想要更好地控制数字的生成方式时，它可以替代“ 自动增量”。由于SEQUENCE缓存值（最多 CACHE ），因此在某些情况下它可能比AUTO INCREMENT快得多。另一个好处是可以访问所有使用的序列生成的最后一个值，从而解决了LAST_INSERT_ID（）的局限性。

trans-unit.source: CREATE SEQUENCE will create a sequence that generates new values when called with NEXT VALUE FOR sequence_name. It's an alternative to AUTO INCREMENT when one wants to have more control of how the numbers are generated. As the SEQUENCE caches values (up to the CACHE value in the CREATE SEQUENCE statement, by default 1000) it can in some cases be much faster than AUTO INCREMENT. Another benefit is that one can access the last value generated by all used sequences, which solves one of the limitations with LAST_INSERT_ID().
trans-unit.target: 当使用NEXT VALUE FOR sequence_name调用时，CREATE SEQUENCE将创建一个生成新值的序列。如果要对数字的生成方式进行更多控制，它可以替代“ 自动增量”。由于SEQUENCE高速缓存值（在CREATE SEQUENCE语句中最多为CACHE值，默认为1000），因此在某些情况下它可能比AUTO INCREMENT快得多。另一个好处是可以访问所有使用的序列生成的最后一个值，这解决了LAST_INSERT_ID（）的局限性。

trans-unit.source: CS saves transaction metadata in $INSTALLDIR/systemFiles/dbrm/DMLLog_$txnid_1 files. There could be a version buffer space deficit while database operation is on the fly. If so CS goes into read-only mode and could fail the failed transaction rollback. If the transaction metadata file is presented DMLProc tries to rollback the transaction. In certain situation the rollback fails and that put the cluster in read-only. The problem's marker is a log entry similar to this:
trans-unit.target: CS将事务元数据保存在$INSTALLDIR/systemFiles/dbrm/DMLLog_$txnid_1文件中。当数据库运行时,可能会出现版本缓冲区空间不足的情况。如果是这样,CS就会进入只读模式,可能会导致失败的事务回滚失败。如果事务元数据文件被提交,DMLProc会尝试回滚事务。在某些情况下,回滚失败,这将使集群进入只读模式。这个问题的标记是一个类似于这样的日志条目。

CTEs are similar to derived tables. For example

CTEs permit a query to reference itself. A recursive CTE will repeatedly execute subsets of the data until it obtains the complete result set. This makes it particularly useful for handing hierarchical or tree-structured data. max_recursive_iterations avoids infinite loops.

trans-unit.source: Calling a FUNCTION

Calling and returning from a CONTINUE handler poses some special problems. Since we need to return to the point after its invocation, we push the return location on a stack in the sp_rcontext (this is done by the execution loop). The handler then ends with a special instruction, sp_instr_hreturn, which returns to this location.
trans-unit.target: 调用和返回CONTINUE处理程序会带来一些特殊的问题。由于我们需要在调用后返回到该点,我们将返回位置推到sp_rcontext的堆栈上(这是由执行循环完成的)。然后,处理程序以一条特殊的指令sp_instr_hreturn结束,它返回到这个位置。

trans-unit.source: Can execute superuser statements: CHANGE MASTER TO, KILL (users who do not have this privilege can only KILL their own threads), PURGE LOGS, SET global system variables, or the mysqladmin debug command. Also, this permission allows the user to write data even if the read_only startup option is set, enable or disable logging, enable or disable replication on slaves, specify a DEFINER for statements that support that clause, connect once after reaching the MAX_CONNECTIONS. If a statement has been specified for the init-connect mysqld option, that command will not be executed when a user with SUPER privileges connects to the server.
trans-unit.target: 可以执行超级用户语句：CHANGE MASTER TO，KILL（不具有此特权的用户只能 KILL 自己的线程），PURGE LOGS，SET全局系统变量或mysqladmin debug命令。同样，即使设置了read_only启动选项，此权限也允许用户写入数据，启用或禁用日志记录，在从属服务器上启用或禁用复制，为支持该子句的语句指定 DEFINER ，在到达 MAX_CONNECTIONS 之后连接一次。如果已为init-connect指定一条语句mysqld选项，当具有 SUPER 特权的用户连接到服务器时，将不执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: Case 1: You insert into the Fact table first and it has an AUTO_INCREMENT id: Grab MAX(id) as the upper bound for summarizing and put it either into some other secure place (an extra table), or put it into the row(s) in the Summary table as you insert them. (Caveat: AUTO_INCREMENT ids do not work well in multi-master, including Galera, setups.)
trans-unit.target: 案例1:你先插入到Fact表中,它有一个AUTO_INCREMENT id。抓取MAX(id)作为汇总的上限,然后把它放到其他安全的地方(一个额外的表),或者在插入时把它放到汇总表中的行中。(注意:AUTO_INCREMENT id在多主表,包括Galera的设置中效果不好。)

trans-unit.source: Case 1: You need to find the raw data involved in some event. But how will you find those row(s)? This is where a secondary index may be required.
trans-unit.target: 案例1:你需要找到某个事件中涉及的原始数据。但是如何找到这些行呢?这时可能需要一个二级索引。

Cassandra 1.2 has slightly changed its data model, as described at http://www.datastax.com/dev/blog/thrift-to-cql3. This has caused some of Thrift-based clients to no longer work (for example, here's a problem experienced by Pig: CASSANDRA-5234).

trans-unit.source: Cassandra SE is currently unable to make use of space in the join buffer (the one whose size is controlled by #join_buffer_size). Instead, it will limit read batches to reading not more than cassandra_multiget_batch_size at a time, and memory will be allocated on the heap.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra SE当前无法使用连接缓冲区（其大小由#join_buffer_size控制的空间）中的空间。取而代之的是，它将读取批次限制为一次读取不超过cassandra_multiget_batch_size，并且将在堆上分配内存。

Cassandra allows one to define a "static column family", where column metadata is defined in the Column Family header and is obeyed by all records.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra允许人们定义一个 "静态列族",其中列元数据在列族头中定义,并被所有记录所服从。

trans-unit.source: Cassandra also allows individual rows to have their own sets of columns. In other words, each row can have its own unique columns.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra还允许各个行拥有自己的列集。换句话说,每一行都可以有自己独特的列。

trans-unit.source: Cassandra doesn't provide any practical way to make INSERT different from UPDATE. Therefore, INSERT works as INSERT-or-UPDATE, it will overwrite the data, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra并没有提供任何实用的方法来使INSERT与UPDATE不同。因此,INSERT与INSERT-or-UPDATE一样工作,必要时它会覆盖数据。

trans-unit.source: Cassandra is only used as an accelerator for analytical queries. Cassandra won't allow arbitrary, ad-hoc dss-type queries, it will require the DBA to create and maintain appropriate column families (however, it is supposed to give a nearly-instant answers to analytics-type questions).
trans-unit.target: Cassandra只作为分析性查询的加速器使用。Cassandra不会允许任意的、ad-hoc的dss类查询,它需要DBA创建和维护相应的列族(不过,它应该是给分析类问题一个近乎即时的答案)。

trans-unit.source: Cassandra storage engine is a part of MariaDB 10.0, starting from MariaDB 10.0.1.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.1开始，Cassandra存储引擎是MariaDB 10.0的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Cassandra storage engine is linked into the server (ie, it is not a plugin). All you need to do is to make sure Thrift's libthrift.so can be found by the loader. This may require adjusting the LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra存储引擎是链接到服务器中的(即,它不是一个插件)。你需要做的就是确保Thrift的libthrift.so可以被加载器找到。这可能需要调整LD_LIBRARY_PATH变量。

trans-unit.source: Causes the binary log position and filename to be appended to the output, useful for dumping a master replication server to produce a dump file that can be used to set up another server as a slave of the master. These are the master server coordinates from which the slave should start replicating after you load the dump file into the slave. If the option is set to 1 (the default), will print it as a CHANGE MASTER command; if set to 2, that command will be prefixed with a comment symbol. This --master-data option will turn --lock-all-tables on, unless --single-transaction is specified too. Before MariaDB 5.3 this would take a global read lock for a short time at the beginning of the dump - see Enhancements for START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT and the --single-transaction option below). In all cases, any action on logs will happen at the exact moment of the dump. This option automatically turns --lock-tables off.
trans-unit.target: 使二进制日志位置和文件名附加到输出，这对于转储主复制服务器很有用，以生成可用于将另一台服务器设置为主服务器的转储文件。这些是将转储文件加载到从属服务器后，从属服务器应从其开始复制的主服务器坐标。如果该选项设置为1（默认值），则将其打印为CHANGE MASTER命令；如果设置为2，则该命令将以注释符号为前缀。该 --master-data 选项将打开 --lock-all-tables ，除非也指定了 --single-transaction 。在MariaDB 5.3之前这将在转储开始时花一小段时间进行全局读取锁定-请参见“使用一致快照开始交易的增强功能和下面的 --single-transaction 选项”。在所有情况下，对日志的任何操作都会在转储的确切时刻发生。此选项自动关闭 --lock-tables 。

trans-unit.source: Caution: Since there is no way to synchronize the clients with the DDL, you must make sure that the clients are happy with either the old or the new schema. Otherwise, you will probably need to take down the entire cluster while simultaneously switching over both the schema and the client code.

trans-unit.source: Caution: This class path is passed as a parameter to the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) when creating it and cannot be modified as it is a read only property. In addition, because MariaDB is a multi-threading application, this JVM cannot be destroyed and will be used throughout the entire life of the MariaDB server. Therefore, be sure it is correctly set before you use the JDBC table type for the first time. Otherwise there will be practically no alternative than to shut down the server and restart it.
trans-unit.target: 注意:在创建类时,这个类的路径会作为参数传递给Java虚拟机(JVM),不能修改,因为它是一个只读属性。这个类的路径在创建Java虚拟机(JVM)时作为一个参数传递给它,不能被修改,因为它是一个只读属性。此外,由于MariaDB是一个多线程应用程序,这个JVM不能被销毁,将在MariaDB服务器的整个生命周期中使用。因此,在第一次使用JDBC表类型之前,要确保它被正确设置。否则,除了关闭服务器并重新启动它之外,几乎没有其他选择。

trans-unit.source: Certain kinds of IN-subqueries cannot be flattened into semi-joins. These subqueries can be both correlated or non-correlated. In order to provide consistent performance in all cases, MariaDB provides several alternative strategies for these types of subqueries. Whenever several strategies are possible, the optimizer chooses the optimal one based on cost estimates.
trans-unit.target: 某些类型的IN子查询无法展平为半联接。这些子查询可以是相关的，也可以是不相关的。为了在所有情况下提供一致的性能，MariaDB针对这些类型的子查询提供了几种替代策略。只要有几种策略可行，优化器就会根据成本估算来选择最佳策略。
